gr.forth.ics.swkm.model2.index
Interface ModelIndexer

All Known Implementing Classes:
HorizontalModelIndexer
public interface ModelIndexer

An entity providing indexing services for an RDF model.

A ModelIndexer implementation

Author:
Andreou Dimitris, email: jim.andreou (at) gmail (dot) com

Method Detail

findTriples

Iterator<Triple> findTriples(Resource namedGraph,
                             ObjectNode subject,
                             Resource predicate,
                             RdfNode object)
Returns an Iterator with all the triples that match the given triple pattern. If any of the subject, predicate or object are null, then the value of the given node of the triple is not taken into acount.

Must not report duplicate triples, if these are contained in more than one named graph and parameter namedGraph is null.

Parameters:
namedGraph - the named graph to match, or null to match any
subject - the subject to match, or null to match any
predicate - the predicate to match, or null to match any
object - the object to match, or null to match any
Returns:
an Iterable with all the triples that match the given triple pattern

deleteTriples

void deleteTriples(Resource namedGraph,
                   ObjectNode subject,
                   Resource predicate,
                   RdfNode object,
                   TripleDeletionListener listener)
Deletes from this indexer all the triples that match the given triple pattern. If any of the subject, predicate or object are null, then the value of the given node of the triple is not taken into acount.

Parameters:
namedGraph - the named graph to match, or null to match any
subject - the subject to match, or null to match any
predicate - the predicate to match, or null to match any
object - the object to match, or null to match any
listener - a listener that is notified for every deleted triple

find

Iterator<RdfNode> find(RdfType type)
Returns all nodes with a given type.

Parameters:
type - the type of the nodes to return
Returns:
all nodes with a given type

findInNamespace

Iterator<Resource> findInNamespace(RdfType type,
                                   Uri namespace)
Returns all nodes with a given type, which also have a URI with a specified namespace.

Parameters:
type - the type of the nodes to return
namespace - the namespace of the nodes to return
Returns:
all nodes with a given type, which also have a URI with a specified namespace

namespaces

Set<Uri> namespaces()
Returns all available namespaces.

Returns:
all available namespaces

setModelView

void setModelView(ModelView modelView)
Sets the ModelView that can be used to access to the (indexed) Model's node collections.

Parameters:
modelView - the ModelView that provides access to the (indexed) Model's node collections

setModel

void setModel(Model model)
Sets the Model that this indexer works on. It also adds all Model connected Listeners (if any) to the Model, so it should be called by the constractor of the Model, to ensure no information is lost.

Parameters:
model - the model that this indexer works on

add

void add(Resource namedGraph,
         Triple triple)
Adds a triple in this indexer.

Parameters:
namedGraph - the named graph (non-null) that the triple is added into
triple - the triple to add to this indexer

addInNamedGraph

void addInNamedGraph(Resource namedGraph,
                     Triple triple)
Adds a triple in this indexer.

Parameters:
namedGraph - the named graph (non-null) that the triple is added into
triple - the triple to add to this indexer

indexFor

Index indexFor(RdfNode node,
               TypeChange typeChange)
Returns an implementation-specific Index, appropriate for an RdfNode, of which the type just changed. This is called by the indexed Model whenever the type of an RdfNode changes, or when the RdfNode is initially created.

The Index can encapsulate data structures to be used by this indexer in order to accelerate queries which involve the specified node.

The returned Index can be then accessed by RdfNode.getIndex().

Parameters:
node - the node that obtained a new type
typeChange - the type change that possibly requires a new index for the changed node. May be null if there is no triple that caused this type change (i.e. when a node gets its initial RdfType.UNKNOWN type
Returns:
a (not necessarily new) appropriate Index for this node and its current type, that can help with queries involving this node, which can subsequently be accessed by RdfNode.getIndex()

removeTripleFromNamedGraph

void removeTripleFromNamedGraph(Resource namedGraph,
                                Triple triple)
Removes a triple from a named graph. The triple itself is not deleted, unless delete(Triple) is called.

Parameters:
namedGraph - the named graph from which to remove the specified triple
triple - the triple to remove from a named graph

delete

void delete(Triple triple)
Deletes a triple from this indexer.

Parameters:
triple - the triple to delete from this indexer

Returns an implementation of methods supporting the "object view".

Returns:
an implementation of methods supporting the "object view"

containsTriple

boolean containsTriple(Triple triple)
Retruns true if the ModelIndexer cointains the specified triple.

Parameters:
triple - the given
Returns:
true if the ModelIndexer cointains the specified triple; false otherwise

tripleCount

int tripleCount()
Retruns the number of triples contained in the indexer
